Our platform is designed to make it easy for users to discover and enjoy Christian music on-demand. With a wide variety of tracks to choose from and the ability to create custom playlists. We aim to create a distraction-free space for Listeners to worship, listen, and find joy in the power of Christian music.

options.name: Sounds like something from hell's kitchen

posts.description: Parisian filmmaker Hedi returns to his native Algeria to create a documentary about St. Augustine, the philosopher and theologian who shaped Western thought. In parallel stories the two men struggle with their beliefs on love, family, truth, and God.

-Joel 2:12-13 (NIV)

The Greek word translated "church" in the New Testament is ekklesia. A literal translation of ekklesia would be “a called-out assembly.” How we got our English word church is a different story, but that, too, is rooted in Greek.
